constituent: whale, fish, bound up, rice field, brains, oven-fire, barbecue, capital, tall, top hat, mouth, small, little
heisigStory: The whale swallows a whole school of fish, who turn their new abode into a proper little fish-capital.
koohiiStory1: If fish were cities, the whale would surely be the capital.
koohiiStory2: When the whale was first discovered it was the biggest fish people had ever seen. Stories exaggerated its size - people said it was as big as the entire capital city!
words: 捕鯨(ほげい): whaling, whale fishing
